nginx.arg1: docker run --security-opt seccomp:./log.json -it --entrypoint='' --name some-nginx -d -p 8080:80 nginx:latest sleep infinity
nginx.arg3: sudo ./speakeru -service nginx -cmd 'docker run -it --entrypoint="" --name some-nginx1 -d -p 8080:80 nginx:latest sleep infinity'

python.arg1: docker run --security-opt seccomp:./log.json -it -d --name some-python python:3.9.16 sh
python.arg3: sudo ./speakeru -service python -cmd 'docker run -it -d --name some-python1 python:3.9.16 sh'

mysql.arg1: docker run --security-opt seccomp:./log.json -d -p 3306:3306 --name some-mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=pas mysql
mysql.arg3: sudo ./speakeru -service mysqld -cmd 'docker run -d -p 3306:3306 --name some-mysql1 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=pas mysql'

node.arg1: docker run --security-opt seccomp:./log.json -it --entrypoint='' --name some-node -d node sh
node.arg3: sudo ./speakeru -service node -cmd 'docker run -it --entrypoint="" --name some-node1 -d node sh'
